title: How to Get Creative Miis Into Your Plaza

steps.headline: Check if you have Internet connection.
steps.description: There is no possible way to do this without Internet. It allows you to use the channels it comes with, such as "Forecast Channel" or "News Channel".

steps.headline: Click on the Check Mii Out Channel and then click the Download button.
Wait for it to be installed.
steps.description: When it is, go back to the Wii Menu and click on it.

steps.headline: Click on the Posting Plaza.
steps.description: Some Miis should appear. You can take all those. It splits into categories, such as Top 50, Popular, Grab Bag, or Favorites.

steps.headline: Take one.
steps.description: When you find one you like, click on it, and select Import Mii, click A, and give it a nickname.

steps.headline: Go back to the Plaza and wait a couple minutes for your Miis to come.
steps.description: If not, turn your Wii off and back on. It will say, "A Mii sent by Nintendo has arrived."

steps.headline: Have fun with your new Miis!
steps.description: You can play as them in Wii Sports, Wii Play, and other games made by Nintendo for the Wii.

steps.headline: (You can use wireless internet if you have a router.
steps.description: But, you can also buy a Ethernet cable with a USB converter so it can go in the USB port in the back of you Wii Console.)

text: Check if you have Internet connection. There is no possible way to do this without Internet. It allows you to use the channels it comes with, such as "Forecast Channel" or "News Channel". Access the Wii Shop Channel.  Click on the Check Mii Out Channel and then click the Download button.  Wait for it to be installed. When it is, go back to the Wii Menu and click on it. Click on the Posting Plaza. Some Miis should appear. You can take all those. It splits into categories, such as Top 50, Popular, Grab Bag, or Favorites. Take one. When you find one you like, click on it, and select Import Mii, click A, and give it a nickname. Go back to the Plaza and wait a couple minutes for your Miis to come. If not, turn your Wii off and back on. It will say, "A Mii sent by Nintendo has arrived." Have fun with your new Miis! You can play as them in Wii Sports, Wii Play, and other games made by Nintendo for the Wii. (You can use wireless internet if you have a router. But, you can also buy a Ethernet cable with a USB converter so it can go in the USB port in the back of you Wii Console.)
